Module cincuentazo
Package cincuentazo.model.card

Interface ICard

All Known Implementing Classes:
Card
public interface ICard
Represents the basic behavior of any playing card in the game "Cincuentazo". Defines how the card value affects the table sum.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    calculateEffect(int currentSum)
    Defines how the card affects the table sum.
    int
    getNumericValue()
    Returns the numeric value of the card.
    String
    getSuit()
    Returns the suit of the card (e.g., "Hearts", "Spades").
    String
    getSymbol()
    Returns the display value of the card (e.g., "A", "K", "5").
    String
    toString()
    Returns a readable representation of the card (symbol + suit).

  • Method Details

    • getSymbol

      String getSymbol()
      Returns the display value of the card (e.g., "A", "K", "5").

    • getNumericValue

      int getNumericValue()
      Returns the numeric value of the card. Cards with letters have special values depending on the game rules.

    • calculateEffect

      int calculateEffect(int currentSum)
      Defines how the card affects the table sum. For example, "A" can add 1 or 10 depending on the game situation.

    • getSuit

      String getSuit()
      Returns the suit of the card (e.g., "Hearts", "Spades").

    • toString

      String toString()
      Returns a readable representation of the card (symbol + suit).
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
